content: aiyu tee wan cheng phua © copyright 2024 knittygrittysg com construction the aiyu tee is a fitted summer crop top with flutter sleeves and lace edging details the seamless set-in sleeve construction is designed for plant fibre yarn typical set-in sleeve construction requires shortrows which creates unsightly holes if you are using plant fibres this construction overcomes that problem of course you can also make the aiyu tee with animal fibre yarn if you wish the tee is worked top down with optional waist shaping you begin by knitting flat for the front and back neckline then stitches are picked up for sleevecaps sleeve and body increases are done through a combination of knitting in the round and knitting flat the body is knitted in the round sleeves are picked up and
